text: John Barron (24 December 1920 - 3 July 2004) was an English actor. Although Barron was a familiar face on British television from the 1950s, he is best remembered for his role in the BBC comedy The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin, since 1976 until the series in 1979 playing CJ Perrin's overbearing boss. Category:1920 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art Category:English television actors
title: John Barron
